comments: a(n) = | t(n+1) | if n>0 where t(n) is the twisted Stern sequence defined by R. Bacher and M. Coons. - _Michael Somos_, Jan 08 2011a(A153893(n)) = 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 13 2011
links: Roland Bacher, Twisting the Stern sequence, arXiv:1005.5627v1 [math.CO], 2010
Michael Coons, On Some Conjectures concerning Stern's Sequence and its Twist, arXiv:1008.0193v3 [math.NT], 2010
formula: G.f. A(x) satisfies A(x) = 2*x + (1 + x + x^2) * A(x^2). - _Michael Somos_, Jan 08 2011
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<2,(n==1) - (n==0), if( n%2, abs( a(n-1) - a(n-2) ), a(n/2)+a(n/2 - 1) ) )}/* _Michael Somos_, Jan 08 2011 */(PARI) {a(n) = local(A, m); if( n<0, 0, m = 1; A = -1 + O(x); while( m <= n, m*=2; A = 2*x + (1 + x + x^2) * subst( A, x, x^2 ) ); polcoeff( A, n ) )} /* _Michael Somos_, Jan 08 2011 */(Haskell)a020944 n = a020944_list !! na020944_list = -1 : f [1,0] where f (x:y:xs) = x : f (y:xs ++ [x,x+y])-- Same list generator function as for a020951_list, cf. A020951.-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 13 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
